price: (Nyankopͻn ho dͻ nti wͻsͻre anadwo) gya wͻn kεtε, wͻsufrε wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn wͻ ehuu mu ne ani daasoͻ mu, na deε Yεde ama wͻn no nso wͻyi mu bi de ma.
arabic: تَتَجَافَىٰ جُنُوبُهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمَضَاجِعِ يَدۡعُونَ رَبَّهُمۡ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعٗا وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: tatajāfā junūbuhum ʿani al-maḍājiʿi yadʿūna rabbahum khawfan waṭamaʿan wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
